posts.author: wthNick
posts.content:
Just coming back to Nwn after about 10 years. With the release of NWN on steam, I figured I'd jump back in! Problem is I've never been that great at creating characters.

My main concern is PvM. I'm not too concerned about PvP (RP wise if my character gets into a conflict with another player, I'm just gonna assume I'll lose lol)


I'd like to do either Rogue or Barbarian. Please no gifts, I don't want leveling to be much harder with the added ECL (Does the +ECL leveling speed start to even out at higher levels? Cause +2-3 ECL is not fun at lower levels). But I may be wrong about the ECL. I'd also like to keep split-classing to a minimum, so I don't suffer an exp penalty for that either.. But I'm always open for suggestions!

I'd like to play as human, but I might go Halfling for the rogue-centric build or Dwarf for the barbarian-centric build. Chaotic Neutral alignment pref.

Was thinking something along the lines of rogue/SD or barbarian/rogue. But I really have no idea what I'm doing build wise.

Thank You guys! I've viewed a few of the other builds you've made up on these forums & it has been very helpful. It makes the game more enjoyable for those of us that aren't good at building characters!
